name: Koakuma Kiss
description:
How long has it been? How many centuries— millennia must I bide by before I, too must sleep? Before then, I want to see them kiss— sweet, in pairs shall they fall from space.

An existential visual novel inspired by dating simulators and the vast emptiness of space. Play matchmaker as Koakuma, trying to get Reisen and Kaguya to kiss before it's all gone.

  • 4 endings
  • 3 minigames
  • 60-minute playthrough, 90-minute completion
  • Multiple POVs
  • Just a few tiny, little secrets
  • Secret ending

Known bugs and workarounds:

Saving and loading currently has issues due to Ren'Py limitations. If you load a save, though you can continue the game as normal, certain conversations and bonuses will be locked due to save data loss. I would HIGHLY recommend completing your first playthrough in one sitting.

Certain interactions in the game are missing in the Web build due to technical limitations. These range from minor and unnoticeable for most players to impacting the true ending of the game. If you don't know what these interactions are then I'd advise downloading the game. The passkey is 665. Remi was trying to be clever.
